question: Which gene is most commonly associated with severe congenital and cyclic neutropenia?
ideal_answer: Neutrophil elastase gene (ELANE) mutations are responsible for the majority of cases of severe congenital neutropenia (SCN) and cyclic neutropenia (CN).
